solution: Any .py file placed directly in a Streamlit pages/ directory (adjacent to the main script) triggers automatic multi-page app detection, adding unwanted sidebar navigation links. Fix: prefix files with underscore (_auth_page.py) to exclude from detection, OR use subdirectories (pages/card_management/) which Streamlit doesn't scan recursively.
